name: MicroHead
description:
Welcome to Technologene© Industries

In MicroHead, you play as a homicidal microwave android determined to reach a mysterious satellite dish. To get there, you'll have to freeze, burn and shoot your way through super powered cyborgs with dubious corporate origins.

Experience a strange continuity of dangerous encounters featuring 2D animated cutscenes in the main game, and face an arduous onslaught of challenging stages in boss rush mode! Aim to clear the floors as fast as possible and compare your times in the discussion board!

This game has been made for the 2023 Boss Rush Game Jam.

Controls

Movement - WASD

Dodge - Shift

Close ranged attacks - Left click

Long ranged attacks - Right click

Special abilities + cycle - Hold Left click + tab

CREDITS

Amit Frenkel

Barakalech

Kizel

Yuval Winter

We encourage you to check out the game's soundtrack, which features an additional combat theme that didn't make it into the final build, here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLn-_ttFJEkapv5cK9PYhS-CZtoSoMkfdg
